text: The Erudite Order is a small [[wizard's circle|arcane order]] in modern-day [[Valenar]], formerly eastern [[Cyre]], having branched off from the [[Arcane Order of Aureon]] several hundred years ago. The order incorporates cultural viewpoints from the [[Khunan]] community there (see the <<navAndScrollToHeader "Cyre" "Outer Cyre">> section ("Eastern Cyre") of the [[Cyre]] page).
title: Erudite Order
